sql.if: and t3.PROCESS_INST_ID in (select t.PROC_INST_ID_ from act_hi_actinst t where t.PROC_INST_ID_=t3.PROCESS_INST_ID and t.ACT_ID_='endevent1')
and t3.spg_Id in (select Rltv_ID from t0_lnk_jrnl_inf where username= #{username ,jdbcType=CHAR})

if.test: userType == null or (userType!=1 and userType !=2 and userType !=3 and userType !=4 and userType !=5 and userType !=6 and userType !=7 and userType !=8)

sql.if:
and (t8.arId like binary CONCAT('%', #{keyWorlds ,jdbcType=CHAR},'%') or t8.processInstId like binary CONCAT('%', #{keyWorlds ,jdbcType=CHAR},'%') or t8.ordrId like binary CONCAT('%', #{keyWorlds ,jdbcType=CHAR},'%')
)

mapper.select:
SELECT t3.Fnc_Entp AS fncEntp, t3.Ustrm_Splr AS ustrmSplr, t3.StgCo AS stgco, t3.Bnk AS bnk, t3.Lgstc_Co AS lgstcCo, t3.Ins_Co AS insCo, t3.SplChain_Co AS splchainCo, _trans_lnk_inf_def_func (t4.TASK_DEF_KEY_, 1) AS aplyPcstpCdName, _trans_lnk_inf_def_func (t4.TASK_DEF_KEY_, 2) AS aplyPcstpCd, t3.BTp as btp, t3.SvcFee_CMd as svcfeeCmd, t3.id AS id, t3.Ar_ID AS arId, t3.Ordr_ID AS ordrId, t3.PROCESS_INST_ID AS processInstId,
t3.SPG_ID AS spgId, t3.Spg_Tm AS spgTm, t3.Spg_Psn AS spgPsn, t3.Spg_Psn_Ctc_Tel AS spgPsnCtcTel, t3.Cnsgn AS cnsgn, t3.Cnsgn_Ctc_Tel AS cnsgnCtcTel, t3.Pps_Lnd AS ppsLnd, t3.Tms AS tms, t3.Spg_St AS spgSt, t3.Crt_Tm AS crtTm, t3.PymtMod as pymtMod, t3.Sel_RdmGds_Mod as selRdmgdsMod FROM ( SELECT distinct t13.ID, t13.Ar_ID , t13.Ordr_ID , t13.SPG_ID , t13.PROCESS_INST_ID , t13.Spg_Tm , t13.Spg_Psn , t13.Spg_Psn_Ctc_Tel , t13.Cnsgn AS cnsgn, t13.Cnsgn_Ctc_Tel , t13.Pps_Lnd , t13.Tms , t13.Spg_St , t13.Crt_Tm, t3.PymtMod, t13.Sel_RdmGds_Mod, t1.Fnc_Entp,t1.Ustrm_Splr,t1.StgCo,t1.Bnk,t1.Lgstc_Co,t1.Ins_Co,t1.SplChain_Co,t1.BTp,t1.SvcFee_CMd FROM T6_Spg_Inf t13, T1_AR_Inf t1,T3_Order_Inf t3 where t13.id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t13.Ar_Id = t1.Ar_Id and t13.ordr_Id=t3.ordr_Id ) t3 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.PROC_INST_ID_, t2.GROUP_ID_, t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ FROM act_ru_task t1, act_ru_identitylink t2 WHERE t1.ID_ = t2.TASK_ID_ ) t4 ON t3.PROCESS_INST_ID = t4.PROC_INST_ID_

SELECT t3.Fnc_Entp AS fncEntp, t3.Ustrm_Splr AS ustrmSplr, t3.StgCo AS stgco, t3.Bnk AS bnk, t3.Lgstc_Co AS lgstcCo, t3.Ins_Co AS insCo, t3.SplChain_Co AS splchainCo, _trans_lnk_inf_def_func (t4.TASK_DEF_KEY_, 1) AS aplyPcstpCdName, _trans_lnk_inf_def_func (t4.TASK_DEF_KEY_, 2) AS aplyPcstpCd, t3.BTp as btp, t3.SvcFee_CMd as svcfeeCmd, t3.id AS id, t3.Ar_ID AS arId, t3.Ordr_ID AS ordrId, t3.PROCESS_INST_ID AS processInstId, t3.SPG_ID AS spgId, t3.Spg_Tm AS spgTm, t3.Spg_Psn AS spgPsn, t3.Spg_Psn_Ctc_Tel AS spgPsnCtcTel, t3.Cnsgn AS cnsgn, t3.Cnsgn_Ctc_Tel AS cnsgnCtcTel, t3.Pps_Lnd AS ppsLnd, t3.Tms AS tms, t3.Spg_St AS spgSt FROM ( SELECT distinct t13.*, t1.Fnc_Entp,t1.Ustrm_Splr,t1.StgCo,t1.Bnk,t1.Lgstc_Co,t1.Ins_Co,t1.SplChain_Co,t1.BTp,t1.SvcFee_CMd FROM T6_Spg_Inf t13, T1_AR_Inf t1 where t13.Spg_ID=#{spgId,jdbcType=CHAR} and t13.Ar_Id = t1.Ar_Id ) t3 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.PROC_INST_ID_, t2.GROUP_ID_, t1.TASK_DEF_KEY_ FROM act_ru_task t1, act_ru_identitylink t2 WHERE t1.ID_ = t2.TASK_ID_ ) t4 ON t3.PROCESS_INST_ID = t4.PROC_INST_ID_
